key.name: font-family
key.description: Monospace font family used for text rendering

key.name: font-size
key.description: Font size (pt) used for text rendering

key.name: smooth-scroll-delay
key.description: The delay in milliseconds between scrolling steps. If set to 0, the smooth scrolling is disabled.

key.name: cell-height-adjustment
key.description: Grid cell dimensions are estimated by rendering a sample string. If some fonts produce ragged rendering, one could adjust the height here.
